name: Stas Tiomkin
content: Stas Tiomkin, Ph.D. | Faculty | Department of Computer Science | TTU Texas Tech University Texas Tech Whitacre College of Engineering Department of Computer Science Faculty Stas Tiomkin, Ph.D. Assistant Professor CS Email: stas.tiomkin@ttu.edu Phone: 806.834.3534 Room Number: EC 315 Cirriculum Vitae Research Interests Artificial Intelligence Intrinsic Motivation R3 Learning {Robot, Reinforcement, Representation} Control & Information Processing in Dynamical Systems Emergence of Collective Intelligence from Individual Effort Human-Machine Nexus / Bi-Directional Perception-Reasoning-Action Loop Education Postdoc. 'Berkeley Artificial Intelligence Research', 'Robot Learning Lab' led by Prof Pieter Abbeel, UC Berkeley,CA, USA (2021) Ph.D. Computer Science and Engineering, Hebrew University, Israel, advisor: Prof Naftali Tishby, co-advisor: Prof Daniel Polani, (2019) MSc. Electrical and Computer Engineering, Technion I.I.T, Israel, advisor: Prof David Malah, (2008) BSc.
